content: Subjects: Physics, Chemistry, Mathematics, English, Computer Science

description: I help manage CI/CD pipelines, automate infrastructure (IaC), handle cloud services, monitor systems, manage containers, ensure security, and collaborate via Git. Daily tasks involve tools like Docker, Kubernetes, AWS, and scripting for deployment automation. Our focus on reliability, cost optimization, scaling, and access management ensures high availability. Teamwork and consistent effort are critical, as any failure impacts both the team and the company. Balanced project work with ongoing civil services preparation, strengthening analytical, problem-solving, and time-management skills.

As BPM Developer, I designed and developed business processes, built UIs using Coach Views, integrated systems via SOAP, automated workflows, and implemented business rules. As a Jr. DevOps Engineer, I learnt working on many tools and worked for the smooth functioning of CI/CD Pipelines.
